subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The strongside linebacker Mathias Kiwanuka sustained a serious leg injury, and Brandon Jacobs, the Giants’ top running back, was also forced to leave during their 16-10 victory over Detroit.
snippet: The strongside linebacker Mathias Kiwanuka sustained a serious leg injury, and Brandon Jacobs, the Giants’ top running back, was also forced to leave during their 16-10 victory over Detroit.
